reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, with one noting it hits the top of their feet, and appreciate its style and quality, particularly as a maternity dress. The fabric receives mixed feedback - while some find it soft and agreeable on the skin, others say it's very thin. The length is also mixed, with some finding it just right while others say it's too long. Customers like the dress's pockets. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Christmas Dress
items.body: I wasn't sure what to expect with the velvet wine option. I was looking for an adorable and good quality velvet dress. There weren't very many reviews for this dress specifically, most of the reviews were for the other fabric type, so I was crossing my fingers. I am pleased to say this dress is exactly what I was looking for. The velvet material feels great, the quality and thickness are exactly what I would except a velvet material to be. It's shiny and soft. The dress fits true to size. I'm 5'3" and125 lbs. Also, an added bonus, it DOES have pockets. I was trying to see if any of the other dresses had pockets on the reviews and I couldn't figure out if it would come with them or not. If you're on the fence about getting this dress, just do it! You won't regret it! Read more
items.author: TylerCrazyFace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress ever
items.body: Absolutely one of the flattering dresses ever. I had so many complements on it. Definitely looks very high end & extremely comfortable. Love this dress. Read more
items.author: April L Cooper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Fit, a bit long for a short girl, not awful
items.body: This is a super cute and comfy dress. I’m 5’2” and this hits the floor in bare feet. I can walk without tripping, but I do have to hold it up to go upstairs and not step on it. I wore it with heeled mules and it worked great without length issues. I loved the v-neck because it covered things nicely. I’m a 34D and I didn’t feel like I was spilling out, but I did show cleavage. I loved the pockets, but it did add bulk in the hip area. It could have been cut on the bottom with a little flare band that would have solved the problem. Instead it was cut straight down so it almost weirdly tapered at the bottom. I gave it a good stretch along the bottom and it was better, but it would have been a better design cut differently. It wasn’t enough to be super noticeable, I’m just aware of the hip area in everything I wear. Read more
items.author: Fancy Face

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Elegant, Comfortable, and Absolutely Stunning
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I wore this navy dress to an evening wedding and received compliments all night long. The design is simple, but that’s what makes it so timeless — it doesn’t try too hard, yet it makes such a statement. The deep navy color looked beautiful under both natural light outdoors and the softer lighting inside the reception. What I really loved was the fit. It hugged in the right places without being restrictive, and the fabric had enough give to move, dance, and sit comfortably through the entire evening. It felt elegant and sophisticated, but I never once felt overdressed or uncomfortable. This is one of those dresses you can pull out for any special occasion and feel instantly confident in. It’s understated, yet absolutely stunning. Read more
items.author: Bookmarked Reflections

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flattering but poor quality.
items.body: The fit is flattering but the quality is not great. Fabric is very thin. I do like the pockets. This is nice to use as a house dress. Read more
items.author: crazyrunningmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these dresses
items.body: Very comfortable for wearing out or lounging in the house. Great colors.. I have ordered these dresses multiple times because I love them so much. The fit is true, the material is soft and light but not see-through and is of decent quality and stretches so even if you ate a little too much at that dinner out you will still be comfortable Read more
items.author: Kimberly Gipson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love at first fit!!
items.body: I absolutely love This dress. I got so many compliments! And the fit is amazing Read more
items.author: Deborah Luedtke

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend but black dye stained my skin
items.body: First just want to warn of dye transfer- it’s 3 days later and I’m still scrubbing off the dye that stained my skin. lol. I also would wash this completely alone or only with the same colored clothing. I definitely recommend sizing up because of the band below the chest if you have a larger chest size. I didn’t have enough time to exchange before the wedding and I made do. Just had to adjust a lot but was comfortable. I got a lot of compliments and it kept me warm when we were outside for the ceremony but didn’t suffocate me during the reception! It’s great for formal weddings because it looks formal but is super comfy. The material is beautiful and didn’t feel scratchy. Again only downside is the dye transfer Read more
items.author: Ivy c

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: G-velvet Green, A-dark Rose, A-black, G-velvet Navy, A-green, A-wine, G-velvet Wine Red, A-navy, G-velvet Black, G-velvet Haze Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
